Role: Moulton College (2007â€“2009)
Jof Davies delivered data-driven internal systems within the Transport Department. He designed and implemented an Access and VBA-based transport management database supporting hundreds of students. The solution handled routes, passenger lists, scheduling, and printable manifests. Jof created custom mapping software to visualise bus routes and student distribution.

He replaced large, complex Excel budgeting and invoicing sheets with controlled data-driven systems that reduced manual errors and improved clarity. This role represented his first large-scale systems engineering project, demonstrating skills in database design, logic automation, VBA, and operational process optimisation.
